static int ll_encode_fh ( struct dentry *  de,
__u32 *  fh,
int *  plen,
int  connectable 
) [static]

connectable - is nfsd will connect himself or this should be done at lustre

The return value is file handle type: 1 -- contains child file handle; 2 -- contains child file handle and parent file handle; 255 -- error.
